title: U.S. Airstrikes Against Islamic State Lift Moral In Mosul
teaser: Now that the U.S. is conducting airstrikes in Syria, what are Iraqis in areas threatened by the Islamic State, also known as ISIS, saying about how U.S. airstrikes have worked against the group there?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
